attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the results of the recent local and European elections, we ask the Prime Minister to recognise that the country has lost confidence in not only his leadership, but the party's ability to run the country. As part of our democratic right, we therefore demand the immediate opportunity for the UK citizens' wishes to be heard and their votes on the issue to be counted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
